body_html: Thanks for bringing this up, but I don't think there's a bug here: the issue is that the data set is split up so that (k-1) words predict the k'th word. So the -1 in that expression leaves room for the label.
body_text: Thanks for bringing this up, but I don't think there's a bug here: the issue is that the data set is split up so that (k-1) words predict the k'th word. So the -1 in that expression leaves room for the label.
body: Thanks for bringing this up, but I don't think there's a bug here: the issue is that the data set is split up so that (k-1) words predict the k'th word. So the -1 in that expression leaves room for the label.
